channel.title: Internet on Strange Labs Computers
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on Strange Labs Computers

item.title: Diagnosing internet issues on Windows 10
item.description: These days you need the internet to survive. It is so embedded into our societies that the UN has said access to it needs to be a human right. We use it for work, play, socialising, researching… so when we cannot use it because of slow, intermittent or no connection at all it is incredibly frustrating. Fortunately Strange Labs has some help you can try to get back online! Is it the router or the PC?

item.title: Strengthening relationships weakened by the internet
item.description: Introduction When I was a teenager, at around 2003, I rebelled against the mobile phone. I don’t know what it was about it but I just didn’t want one. Without really thinking too much about it then, I believe I foresaw a future of increasing social connections and as a result, imagined each connection becoming weaker. It may have been a bit of that, but it was definitely a bit of relunctance to being able to be contacted 24/7.
